ygData.subject: Re: effect time
ygData.msgSnippet: The darkness and Blood Boil times are all about  1:45 to 2minutes. The times do not change through any of the upgrades. Heart Flutter is also about 1:45 I
ygData.messageBody:
The darkness and Blood Boil times are all about 1:45 to 2minutes. The times
do not change through any of the upgrades. Heart Flutter is also about 1:45
I believe although I haven't used this in quite awhile so I'm not really
sure.

Naeeldar
